content.user_title: Create viral content with Defou workflow
content.value_statement: Content creators struggle to transform scattered ideas into compelling, structured posts. This workflow provides a systematic approach to brainstorming, writing, and optimizing content for maximum engagement using proven viral content patterns.
actual_capabilities: Analyzes raw ideas and generates 3 distinct angles for content
Creates 5 content templates: experience, counter-intuitive, list, case study, growth
Produces 4 hook variations per content piece
Scores viral potential across 4 dimensions (curiosity, resonance, clarity, share value)
Recommends optimal posting times based on content type
limitations: Outputs content in Simplified Chinese only
Does not publish directly to social media platforms

use_cases.title: Streamline content production
use_cases.description: Generate weeks of content ideas in minutes using systematic templates and viral scoring.

use_cases.title: Build consistent voice
use_cases.description: Create on-brand content that aligns with the 'Defou' counter-consensus style.

use_cases.title: Scale content output
use_cases.description: Transform raw notes into polished, shareable posts with optimal posting times.

prompt_templates.title: Basic content analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze this content idea and create a Defou-style report: [paste your notes or topic]

prompt_templates.title: Counter-intuitive angle
prompt_templates.prompt: Find the counter-intuitive angle in this topic and generate all 5 content templates: [topic]

prompt_templates.title: Platform optimization
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate content for this topic and include viral potential scores for each piece: [topic]

prompt_templates.title: Full workflow execution
prompt_templates.prompt: Run the complete Defou workflow: analyze, generate 5 templates with hooks, score virality, and recommend posting times for: [topic]

best_practices: Provide raw ideas with clear context for better angle selection
Use the viral scoring to refine hooks before publishing
Follow the recommended posting times for maximum reach
anti_patterns: Do not provide content that violates platform guidelines
Do not use for generating misleading or deceptive content
Do not ignore the scoring feedback when optimizing for engagement
